title: AntiCheat+反作弊插件的magic.yml咋修改成稳定点的
txt_content:
我服太多熊作弊了 装了AntiCheat+ 我开小号有时不小心就被ban 走路[没疾跑]都会说是作弊然后弹回去 咋修改得稳定点啊
这是目前文件里的配置[没怎么改过]
# AntiCheat configuration file # Please report any bugs: http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/anticheat/ # Documentation for these values is available at http://gravitydevelopment.net/do ... roviders/Magic.html ANIMATION_INTERACT_MAX: 5 ANIMATION_MIN: 200 ASCENSION_COUNT_MAX: 8 BLOCK_BREAK_MIN: 0.1 BLOCK_MAX_DISTANCE: 5.5 BLOCK_MAX_DISTANCE_CREATIVE: 6.0 BLOCK_PLACE_MIN: 0.1 BLOCK_PUNCH_MIN: 5 BOW_ERROR: 0.25 CHAT_ACTION_ONE_LEVEL: 3 CHAT_ACTION_TWO_LEVEL: 5 CHAT_MIN: 100 CHAT_REPEAT_MIN: 260 CHAT_WARN_LEVEL: 7 COMMAND_ACTION_ONE_LEVEL: 3 COMMAND_ACTION_TWO_LEVEL: 5 COMMAND_MIN: 100 COMMAND_REPEAT_MIN: 260 DAMAGE_TIME: 3000 DIRECTION_MAX_BUFFER: 100 DROP_CHECK: 10 DROP_TIME_MIN: 800 DROPPED_ITEM_TIME: 100 EAT_TIME_MIN: 1000 ENTERED_EXITED_TIME: 1000 ENTITY_MAX_DISTANCE: 5.9 ENTITY_MAX_DISTANCE_CREATIVE: 6.5 EXIT_FLY_TIME: 2000 EXPLOSION_DAMAGE_TIME: 5000 FASTBREAK_LIMIT: 2 FASTBREAK_MAXVIOLATIONS: 2 FASTBREAK_MAXVIOLATIONS_CREATIVE: 4 FASTBREAK_MAXVIOLATIONTIME: 10000 FASTBREAK_TIMEMAX: 1000 FASTBREAK_TIMEMAX_CREATIVE: 100 FASTPLACE_MAXVIOLATIONS: 2 FASTPLACE_MAXVIOLATIONS_CREATIVE: 3 FASTPLACE_MAXVIOLATIONTIME: 10000 FASTPLACE_TIMEMIN: 50 FASTPLACE_ZEROLIMIT: 3 FIGHT_MIN_DISTANCE: 4.25 FIGHT_TIME_MIN: 85 FLIGHT_BLOCK_LIMIT: 15.0 FLIGHT_LIMIT: 150 HEAL_TIME_MIN: 2000 INSTANT_BREAK_TIME: 2 INVENTORY_CHECK: 4000 INVENTORY_TIMEMIN: 50 JOIN_TIME: 2000 KNOCKBACK_DAMAGE_TIME: 4000 LADDER_Y_MAX: 0.11761 LADDER_Y_MIN: 0.11759 NOFALL_LIMIT: 9 PROJECTILE_CHECK: 10 PROJECTILE_TIME_MIN: 1500 SNEAK_TIME: 250 SPEED_MAX: 3 SPRINT_FOOD_MIN: 6 SPRINT_MIN: 0.2 TELEPORT_MIN: 400 TELEPORT_TIME: 1000 TIMER_STEP_CHECK: 20 TIMER_TIMEMIN: 45 VELOCITY_CHECKTIME: 2100 VELOCITY_DISTANCE_COUNT: 4.0 VELOCITY_MAXTIMES: 2 VELOCITY_MIN_DISTANCE: 0.1 VELOCITY_PREVENT: 5000 VELOCITY_SCHETIME: 2 VELOCITY_TIME: 3 WATER_ASCENSION_VIOLATION_MAX: 13 WATER_CLIMB_MAX: 0.15 WATER_SPEED_VIOLATION_MAX: 4 XZ_TICK_MAX: 5.75 XZ_SPEED_MAX: 0.25 XZ_SPEED_MAX_FLY: 0.56 XZ_SPEED_ICE_MULTIPLIER: 1.25 XZ_SPEED_WEB_MULTIPLIER: 0.4 XZ_SPEED_MAX_POTION: 0.7 XZ_SPEED_MAX_POTION_SPRINT: 0.95 XZ_SPEED_MAX_SNEAK: 0.15 XZ_SPEED_MAX_SOULSAND: 0.13 XZ_SPEED_MAX_SOULSAND_POTION: 0.16 XZ_SPEED_MAX_SOULSAND_SPRINT: 0.2 XZ_SPEED_MAX_SPRINT: 0.65 XZ_SPEED_MAX_WATER: 0.19 XZ_SPEED_MAX_WATER_SPRINT: 0.3 Y_HOVER_BUFFER: 0.25 Y_HOVER_TIME: 6.0 Y_MAXDIFF: 5.0 Y_MAXVIOLATIONS: 1 Y_MAXVIOTIME: 5000 Y_SPEED_MAX: 0.5 Y_TIME: 1000

replies.author: youngklps
replies.txt_content: 这不能改。。。你把config里面ban和kick都改成none就不会被t被ban

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
将
SPEED_MAX: 3 改大点
WATER_SPEED_VIOLATION_MAX: 4
XZ_SPEED_MAX: 0.25
XZ_SPEED_MAX_FLY: 0.56
XZ_SPEED_ICE_MULTIPLIER: 1.25
XZ_SPEED_WEB_MULTIPLIER: 0.4
XZ_SPEED_MAX_POTION: 0.7
XZ_SPEED_MAX_POTION_SPRINT: 0.95
XZ_SPEED_MAX_SNEAK: 0.15
XZ_SPEED_MAX_SOULSAND: 0.13
XZ_SPEED_MAX_SOULSAND_POTION: 0.16 
XZ_SPEED_MAX_SOULSAND_SPRINT: 0.2
XZ_SPEED_MAX_SPRINT: 0.65 

总之和speed有关的都调大些就没问题←根据默认比例增加

lichi2050 发表于 2015-10-29 19:03
将
SPEED_MAX: 3 改大点
WATER_SPEED_VIOLATION_MAX: 4
每个加多少合适呢

lichi2050 发表于 2015-10-29 19:03
将
SPEED_MAX: 3 改大点
WATER_SPEED_VIOLATION_MAX: 4
能帮我弄一下么 加Q1685354977 我文件发给你
